section_title: IMPLEMENTATION OF ALL THE ELEMENTS OF DECISION 1/CP.17:
sentences: The agenda item (FCCC/ADP/2013/L.2) on the implementation of all the elements of Decision 1/CP.17 (Durban Platform for Enhanced Action) includes Workstreams 1 (the 2015 agreement) and 2 (pre-2020 ambition).
It was first taken up in the ADP opening plenary.
Subsequent work was structured around workshops and roundtables, as well as an informal plenary held on Wednesday, 12 June.
During the closing plenary on Thursday, 13 June the ADP adopted conclusions.
